document_data.name: Eshowdowan Shaman
document_data.alignment2e: {{Alignment grid| off  | off  | off | off | off | on | off  | on | on }}
document_data.mainbody: '''Eshowdowan shamans''' were [[specialty priest]]s devoted to [[Eshowdow]], the Shadow Giant within the [[Chultan pantheon]].
document_data.Activities: Eshowdowan shamans were involved in planning the downfall of the [[Tabaxi (tribe)|tabaxi]].
document_data.Culture: Eshowdowan shamans were always [[human]]s of [[Eshowe]] descent. They all participated in the ''[[summon shadow spirit]]'' incantation upon becoming a shaman.
document_data.Abilities: These individuals specifically communicated with the [[spirit]]s of dead Eshowe. The spirits they contacted could invoke a number of magical powers on their behalf including ''[[chill touch]]'', ''[[spook]]'', ''[[scare]]'', ''[[spectral hand]]'', ''[[Lorloveim's creeping shadow]]'', ''[[spirit armor]]'', ''[[wraithform]]'', ''[[enervation]]'', ''[[fear]]'', ''[[shadow monsters]]'', ''[[shadow door]]'', ''[[shadow magic]]'', ''[[shades]]'', and ''[[shadow walk]]''.
document_data.Possessions: They used a variety of weapons including [[hand axe]]s, [[blowgun]]s, [[club]]s, ''[[kerrie]]'', [[spear]]s, and ''[[yklwa]]s''. [[Armor]] usually consisted of [[Hide armor|dinosaur hide]], Eshowe [[scale mail]], or [[leather armor]].
